title: Music Competition - Teaser

embed.description: To celebrate the OPL Final, we offered our players in OCE the opportunity to cover a League music track and have their entry played at the OPL Final this Sunday! Get your tickets at https://www.melbourneesportsopen.com.au/ Sponsored by Logitech.

body: Before Elijah's cover premieres at the OPL Final this Sunday we were able to talk to him and a few of the talented people behind the scenes to find out how it came to be.
